transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir good morning.
Executive: Good morning good morning. Sir Ayush baat kar raha hun India Mart se.
Customer: Ji ji haan bataiye.
Executive: Maine maine kaha sir abhi connect kar le aap ho system ke samne?
Customer: Ah bas 15 minute mein pahunch jaunga 11 baje.
Executive: Chaliye sir chaliye koi issue nahi aapko 15 minute baad mein call kar leta hun theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay sir haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- None



Resolution:

- None



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will call the customer back in 15 minutes.

Alert (If Any):

None
